Name: Guard Bow
LongDescription: Protects against weather damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Wurmple, Silcoon, Beautifly, Cascoon, and Dustox.  Finding a Guard Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
